title: Set alias for columns in dataset, but in expression builder the old column names are still displayed when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases that were set for the columns in the dataset.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new datasource and dataset.
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the expression builder and try to select the dataset for the data item.
